name: TweetTweetJam Entry: Sort of Hoopball
description:
My 2nd #TweetTweetJam entry, a game made in Pico-8 using 560 characters or less, is:

Sort of HOOPBALL!

THE OBJECT OF THE GAME:

  • Adjust the angle of your shot
  • Get the ball through the hoop
  • How many points can you score before you go back to work?

THE CONTROLS:

  • Press Up or Down to adjust the angle of your shot.
  • Press Z to shoot the ball.
  • Hit the Reset button to restart the game

I want to see your best score before your boss catches you playing games on the computer.  Screenshot your score and share with the hashtag #SortofHoopball
